Dear Aindrea, 
 
 Today is your lucky day: you're going to experience a lovely trip around Verona prepared by your boyfriend Mattia, in the quest of Love.
 
 This application especially made for this purpose will guide through this adventure. 
 It will give you some targets to reach and provide you with a special piece of message every time you reach one. At the end, the messages will be put togheter to unveal the solution of this game. Just like a treasure hunt.
 
 We don't want to tell you much yet to not spoil the fun. Just know that your will be required to walk around quite a bit. 
 
 So, let's get started! Please press the "Continue" button below

There aren't many rules for today, but just to make sure you know what to do: here are a few instructions to successfully complete The Love Quest
 
 - this application is going to guide you through a list of steps 

 - every time you complete a step, press "Continue" to go to the next one 

 - some steps are going to involve you walking somewhere. When you reach your target, please take a picture of yourself in that place to prove you've been there before continuing on to the step after 

 - after you reach the target you'll be given a piece of message. You might want to write it down so that at the end you can put all the pieces togheter 

 - after some steps we'll ask you to text Mattia to provide him your position (don't worry, we'll remind you when you need to do so)

 - if you don't feel like walking and prefer to use the bus, you can; just know that all the targets are at walking distance from each other, so we suggest you to take your time and use your feet to enjoy it more :-) 

 - there is no rush! enjoy this adventure 

 - if you ever want to go previous steps, simply use the "back" button of your phone. Indeed, why don't you try it right now? Go back to the welcome screen and then "Continue" again to come back here 

 - when you need to leave the application (to send a text, make a call, etc.), just open it up again and it should resume from where you left it. You will find it in your application list under "Catchme". 

 - if the application doesn't resume properly, but instead starts from the beginning, just quickly skip the steps that you have already completed 

 - please leave your internet connection on in order for all the steps to work properly

Ok, it\'s time to get ready now and start this adventure! Have a shower, wear something, put your make-up on, etc. etc. \n \n When you\'re ready to go grab your phone and \"Continue\" to start your Love Quest!
Time to text Mattia: \"ON MY WAY\"
Piece of message #5:\n \"I love your smile that always makes me laugh.\"

Wow, you reached the first target, congratulations! Woo hoo!

 Awww, do you remember all the times we had sacher here? Mmmh, that's soooo good. How lovely are our strolls in the summer nights! I just love to walk around with you, chat, have an ice cream and relax. I can't wait for the weather to get warmer and start again.
 
 
 Ok, since you reached your first target, don't forget to take a picture to prove you've been here! Exit the application (just use the "home" button of your phone), take a picture, and then open it up again to continue.
Piece of message #11:\n \"I love how every time I\'m grumpy you can change my mood.\"
We love our pizzas here, don\'t we? But what I most love is to have pizza with you: spend the night chatting, hearing your stories, and laughing. Mmmh, shall we have a pizza tonight? :-)
Piece of message #2:\n \"I love your hair and the funny bit that sticks out of it at the front.\"

Your old via badile house. So many things happened here! 
 Do you remember the little "ou" man drawn on the whiteboard? And that time when they cut your electricity? 
 And when I did the shopping for you? And when I showed you how to cook carbonara? And the first Valentine's Day? And...oh, I better stop and let you continue your journey :-) 
 Remember to take a picture!
Time to text Mattia: \"VIA BADILE REACHED\"
Piece of message #9:\n \"I love to walk with you and having to go slower because your legs are little and you can\'t keep up.\"

I will never forget the first time I saw you. I was doing my museum walk, going around the room and pretending to be interested in those old radios, when I saw you standing in a corner, looking at some electonic stuff. 
 You were wearing your short black jacket, and brown trousers. I remember I thought "wow, she's so beautiful! I wander who she is. Maybe Antonia knows her and can introduce me to her". 

 And then we went to that bar with crappy karaoke, I had an hot chocolate and you had a coke. But really you wanted an hot chocolate too :-) Then we exchanged numbers, Andreas. Then there was the Tibet night. And the rest is history...
Piece of message #7:\n \"I love your hands that always smell of that liquid to clean them, and how we keep it when we go to throw away the rubbish togheter.\"

Here we had our first date, do you remember? I\'m sure you do. Oh, I was so nervous! While I was waiting for you outside the school I had butterflies in my stomach. \n I had margherita and you had prosciutto e funghi...aww, such a polite couple! Eh eh. You told me about your experiences around the world, your family, your cat, etc. etc. I couldn\'t stop listening to you, I was already in love :-) ah ah, and then you were too shy to give me a small kiss to thank me for paying for the pizza. Awww, bless you.\n And then we walked, and walked, and walked...there was always an extra ultimo giro just to chat some more.
Time to text Mattia: \"FIRST DATE REACHED\"
Piece of message #4:\n \"I love your eyes that look so big on your piccolina face.\"

I used to take you back here after our walks, do you remember? And then we would exchange a little kiss on the cheek, eh eh. Buonanotte, mwah mwah. And immediately after we would both think "oh, i should have kissed her!". Ah, good memories. 

 We have so many memories here! She was definitely crazy, but thank God she was there and we met. 
 Oh, do you remember that time when I slept here? Ah ah, and then I had to sneak out in the morning. Fun :-)
Time to text Mattia: \"ANTONIA\'S HOUSE REACHED\"
Piece of message #12:\n \"I love to wake up with you every morning and see your sleepy face.\"

\"You\'re very nice tonight\" \"Uh uh, thank you\". Oh, I\'ll never forget that moment! It was our second date, we came here to watch Enchanted. I wanted to hold your hand during the film, but I was too shy. You were wearing a pink top and a scarf, and you told me how much you loved scarfs. \n By the way, that\'s why I bought you that scarf for christmas (that one that you never wore!)
Piece of message #3:\n \"I love your ears and the way you always try to cover them.\"

Uh, a sad one...here is where we encountered a little bump in the road. "Sono confusa, devo ti parlare". 
 That night we talked a lot, you tried to explain me how you felt, and then we arrived here, I looked into your eyes and asked you: "Are you sure this is what you want?". And after an hesitation you said yes, that was what you wanted.
 
 5 minutes later..."Emilyyyyyyyyyy, what have I done?!?!". Luckily I sent you that message, you made up your mind and came back to me. As I said, just a little bump in the long road we're walking togheter.
Piece of message #8:\n \"I love how you always find new bruces on you but you don\'t know how you hurt yourself.\"

Ok, this is difficult. You might not remember this, but I do. 

 It was our first date and we were walking around the center, whilst I was explaining everything to you about Verona, ancient roman, etc. We arrived here - not exactly here, but near here - and there was a bombolone sleeping at the side of the road. You were walking on that side, so I exchanged place with you and protected you while walking near him. 

 And from that moment on I protected my piccolina from everything bad around her.
Time to text Mattia: \"POZZO AMORE REACHED\"
Piece of message #6:\n \"I love your nose when it\'s itchy and you have faggia.\"
Target 10: Taverna di Via Stella - Reached!

Of all the times we\'ve been here, I particularly remember when I first met your parents. Oh, I was really nervous! It was just a couple of months after we got togheter. First we met in piazza bra\' and then we came here, and we had a lovely evening. I think your mum started loving me from that night :-)\n\n I was nervous but not scared: I knew already I would have been with you for a looooooong time...
Time to text Mattia: \"VIA STELLA REACHED\"
Piece of message #10:\n \"I love to go on holiday with you and have a good nap.\"

Here is where we exchanged our first kiss...oh no, wait, we didn't! Eh eh. You were too shy, but nevermind. It all fell into place in the end. 

 I remember that night when I was walking home you texted me "thank you for being so patient, sorry if I'm so shy" and I replied "don't worry, it will all come at the right time". 

 Indeed, the right time arrived short after.
Time to text Mattia: \"PONTE PIETRA REACHED\"
Piece of message #1:\n \"Aindrea Elizabeth Harte, since the first time I met you I knew I was in love with you and loved everything about you.\"

You knew you would have arrived here sooner or later. This is where our love started: the first kiss. I remember every second of that day.

 First I came to you at Antonia's house, and we walked to the center holding hands for the first time. Actually my hand hit yours accidentally, but you said "uh, holding hands, nice" and so we did...but hey, nevermind, that was cool :-) 
 then we walked and I brought you here, at the Torre dei Lamberti, right at the top; I showed you where I lived, and that was the moment when you realized I didn't live near San Zeno. You understood I really cared about you, I was willing to walk all that way just for you! 
 So you hugged me, and that was the moment I kissed you, just before telling you how beautiful you are and how much I liked you. 
 That's when our story began.

 P.S. You better take a nice picture here :-)
Time to text Mattia: \"TORRE DEI LAMBERTI REACHED\"
Piece of message #13:\n \"For a million reasons more, I love you And I want to spend the rest of my life with you.\"

Congratulations, your quest is complete! You have been really good, you got here. Weeeeee...oh no, hang on a second, it' not over yet!
 There is still one last target to reach: home. 
 
 Get home to complete your quest and find love
You\'re home, now go upstairs and meet your love
Are you sure you\'re home with your love? If so, please continue
The quest is getting difficult, you\'re gonna need the help of your real love. Please hand your phone to him to let him help you.

Aindrea Elizabeth Harte, since the first time I met you I knew I was in love with you and loved everything about you. 

 I love your hair and the funny bit that sticks out of it at the front. 

 I love your ears and the way you always try to cover them. 

 I love your eyes that look so big on your piccolina face. 

 I love your smile that always makes me laugh. 

 I love your nose when it's itchy and you have faggia. 

 I love your hands that always smell of that liquid to clean them, and how we keep it when we go to throw away the rubbish togheter. 

 I love how you always find new bruces on you but you don't know you hurt yourself. 

 I love to walk with you and having to go slower because your legs are little and you can't keep up. 

 I love to go on holiday with you and have a good naps. 

 I love how every time I'm grumpy you can change my mood. 

 I love to wake up with you every morning and see your sleepy face. 

 For a million reasons more, I love you And I want to spend the rest of my life with you. 

 Will you marry me?
Thank you for playing with us. We hope to have you back again. Bye bye xxx
